languages.text: {n}Джай осекается.{/n} "Я, скорее, надеялась немного скрасить атмосферу шуткой, чем всерьез описать..."
{n}Jae interrupts.{/n} "I was actually trying to bring a little levity. I wasn't seriously describing—"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай осекается.{/n} "Я, скорее, надеялась немного скрасить атмосферу шуткой, чем всерьез описать..."

languages.text: {n}ジェイが言葉をさえぎる。{/n}「実は、少しだけ平静を装うとしていたのよ。真面目に説明していたわけではなくて…」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae interrupts.{/n} "I was actually trying to bring a little levity. I wasn't seriously describing—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイが言葉をさえぎる。{/n}「実は、少しだけ平静を装うとしていたのよ。真面目に説明していたわけではなくて…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊插了进来。{/n}“我只想让大家轻松一下，并不是认真地在描述——”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae interrupts.{/n} "I was actually trying to bring a little levity. I wasn't seriously describing—"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊插了进来。{/n}“我只想让大家轻松一下，并不是认真地在描述——”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae l'interrompt.{/n} « J'essayais simplement d'alléger l'atmosphère. Je ne décrivais pas sérieusement... »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae interrupts.{/n} "I was actually trying to bring a little levity. I wasn't seriously describing—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae l'interrompt.{/n} « J'essayais simplement d'alléger l'atmosphère. Je ne décrivais pas sérieusement... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae interrumpe.{/n} «En realidad solo quería quitarle un poco de hierro al asunto. No estaba describien...».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae interrupts.{/n} "I was actually trying to bring a little levity. I wasn't seriously describing—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae interrumpe.{/n} «En realidad solo quería quitarle un poco de hierro al asunto. No estaba describien...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae unterbricht.{/n} "Eigentlich wollte ich nur für etwas Leichtigkeit sorgen. Ich habe nicht ernsthaft beschrieben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae interrupts.{/n} "I was actually trying to bring a little levity. I wasn't seriously describing—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae unterbricht.{/n} "Eigentlich wollte ich nur für etwas Leichtigkeit sorgen. Ich habe nicht ernsthaft beschrieben ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae bölüyor.{/n} "Biraz abartayım dedim canım. Gerçek anlamda söylemiyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae interrupts.{/n} "I was actually trying to bring a little levity. I wasn't seriously describing—"
